responses.rationale: The segment provides factual information about turkey production without intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment provides factual information about egg production and chicken population without intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment reports on culling numbers without using intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment reports on culling numbers across the nation without using intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment reports on new infections and culling numbers without using intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment describes the likely cause of spread without using intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment reports on confirmed cases in specific states without using intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment contains the intensifier 'so' directly modifying the risk-adjective 'infectious'.
The segment reports on a confirmed case without using intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment reports on the location of the latest cases without using intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
